title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

what: Alerts, Notifications and Loading Screen in Shiny
title: Alerts, Notifications and Loading Screen in Shiny
text: Easily create alerts, notifications, tooltips loading screens Shiny

title: Alerts, Notifications and Loading Screen in Shiny
text: can install development version standby GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("rsquaredacademy/standby")

title: Alerts, Notifications and Loading Screen in Shiny
text: use spinners/loaders standby Shiny application, include following UI part app: Include dependencies using appropriate use* functions (useSpinkit() example). Wrap target output using corresponding rendering function (spinkit() example).

title: Alerts, Notifications and Loading Screen in Shiny
code: library(shiny) library(standby)  ui <- fluidPage(    standby::useSpinkit(), # include dependencies   fluidRow(     standby::spinkit(plotOutput("plot1")), # wrap output inside loader     actionButton("render", "Render")   )  )  server <- function(input, output, session) {      output$plot1 <- renderPlot({       input$render       Sys.sleep(3)       plot(cars)     })  }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Alerts, Notifications and Loading Screen in Shiny
text: table displays dependency rendering functions along references:

title: Alerts, Notifications and Loading Screen in Shiny
text: use alerts notifications buzz Shiny application, follow steps: Include dependencies UI part app using appropriate use* functions (useToast() example). Include corresponding rendering function Server part app (toast() example).

title: Alerts, Notifications and Loading Screen in Shiny
code: library(shiny) library(standby) ui <- fluidPage(   useBootBox(), # include dependencies   actionButton(inputId = "notify",                label   = "Show Notification") ) server <- function(input, output, session) {   observeEvent(input$pnotify, {     bootBox(class = "rubberBand") # display the alert   }) } shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Alertify — useAlertify
text: Pretty browser alerts notifications.

title: Alertify — useAlertify
code: useAlertify()  alertify_alert(   title = "Alert Title",   message = "Alert Message",   type = "success",   btn_label = "OK",   transition = "pulse",   transition_off = FALSE,   closable = TRUE,   auto_reset = FALSE,   frameless = FALSE,   maximizable = FALSE,   modal = FALSE,   movable = FALSE,   move_bounded = TRUE,   overflow = FALSE,   padding = TRUE,   pinnable = FALSE,   resizeable = FALSE,   start_maximized = FALSE,   session = getDefaultReactiveDomain() )  alertify_notify(   message = "Alert Message",   type = "success",   delay = 5,   position = "bottom-right",   session = getDefaultReactiveDomain() )

title: Alertify — useAlertify
text: title Dialog title. message Dialog contents. type Dialog type. Defaults "success". Valid values : "success" "error" "warning" "message" btn_label OK button label. transition Transition effect used showing/hiding dialog. Defaults "pulse". Valid values : "pulse" "slide" "zoom" "fade" "flipx" "flipy" transition_off Logical; TRUE, transition effect disabled. Defaults FALSE. closable Logical; TRUE (default), |codeClose button displayed header dialog. auto_reset Logical; TRUE (default), dialog reset size/position window resize. frameless Logical; TRUE, hides header footer dialog. Defaults FALSE. maximizable Logical; TRUE (default), Maximize button displayed header dialog. modal Logical; TRUE (default), screen dimmer used access page contents prevented. movable Logical; TRUE (default), dialog movable. move_bounded Logical; TRUE, dialog allowed go -screen. Defaults FALSE. overflow Logical; TRUE (default), content overflow managed dialog padding Logical; TRUE (default), content padding managed dialog. pinnable Logical; TRUE (default), Pin button displayed header dialog. resizeable Logical; TRUE, dialog resizable. Defaults FALSE. start_maximized Logical; TRUE, dialog start maximized state. Defaults FALSE. session Shiny session object. delay time (seconds) wait notification auto-dismissed. 0 keep notification open till clicked. position Position notification. Defaults "bottom-right". Valid values : "bottom-right" "bottom-left" "bottom-center" "top-right" "top-left" "top-center"

title: Alertify — useAlertify
text: None

title: Alertify — useAlertify
text: useAlertify: Dependencies include UI. alertify_alert: Display alerts. alertify_notify: Display notifications.

title: Alertify — useAlertify
code: # Example 1: Alert if (interactive()) { library(shiny) library(standby)  ui <- fluidPage(    useAlertify(), # include dependencies   actionButton(inputId = "btn",                label   = "Alert Demo")  )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    observeEvent(input$btn, {     # display alert     alertify_alert("Hey there!", "Thank you for exploring standby!")   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server) }  # Example 2: Notification if (interactive()) { library(shiny) library(standby)  ui <- fluidPage(    useAlertify(), # include dependencies   actionButton(inputId = "btn",                label   = "Notification Demo")  )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    observeEvent(input$btn, {     # display notification     alertify_notify("Hey there! Thank you for exploring standby!")   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server) }

title: BootBox — useBootBox
text: Bootstrap modals made easy.

title: BootBox — useBootBox
code: useBootBox()  bootBox(   title = "Your title",   message = "Your message here...",   size = "small",   close_on_escape = TRUE,   show = TRUE,   backdrop = NULL,   close_button = TRUE,   animate = TRUE,   class = NULL,   session = getDefaultReactiveDomain() )

title: BootBox — useBootBox
text: title Adds header dialog. message Text displayed dialog. size Adds relevant Bootstrap modal size class dialog wrapper. Valid values : "small" "large" "extra-large" close_on_escape Logical; TRUE (default), allows user dismiss dialog hitting ESC key. show Logical; TRUE (default), dialog shown immediately. backdrop Logical; TRUE, backdrop displayed clicking dismisses dialog. Defaults NULL. Valid values : NULL: backdrop displayed, clicking effect. TRUE: backdrop displayed, clicking dismisses dialog. FALSE: backdrop displayed. close_button Logical; TRUE (default), close button displayed. animate Logical; TRUE (default), animates dialog . class Custom CSS class (using Animate.css). session Shiny session object.

title: BootBox — useBootBox
text: None

title: BootBox — useBootBox
text: useBootBox: Dependencies include UI. bootBox: Display modals.

title: BootBox — useBootBox
code: if (interactive()) { library(shiny) library(standby)  ui <- fluidPage(    useBootBox(), # include dependencies   actionButton(inputId = "btn",                label   = "BootBox Demo")  )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    observeEvent(input$btn, {     # display modal     bootBox("Hey there!", "Thank you for exploring standby!")   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server) }

title: CSS Loaders — useLoaders
text: Simple CSS loaders

title: CSS Loaders — useLoaders
code: useLoaders()  loaders(uiOutput, type = "default", style = NULL, text = NULL)

title: CSS Loaders — useLoaders
text: uiOutput output element wrapped within loader. type type loader use. Visit https://css-loader.raphaelfabeni.com/ details. default bar bar-ping-pong border double clock curtain pokeball ball smartphone bouncing music style Custom styling loaders. text Custom text. Available following types: default bar border curtain smartphone

title: CSS Loaders — useLoaders
text: None

title: CSS Loaders — useLoaders
text: useLoaders: Dependencies include UI. loaders: Display loading animation.

title: CSS Loaders — useLoaders
code: if (interactive()) {   library(shiny)    shinyApp(     ui = fluidPage(       useLoaders(),       actionButton("render", "Render"),       loaders(uiOutput = plotOutput("plot"),               type = "default",               style = "half",               text = "Loading...")     ),     server = function(input, output) {       output$plot <- renderPlot({         input$render         Sys.sleep(3)         hist(mtcars$mpg)       })     }   ) }

title: MicroTip — useMicroTip
text: Minimal CSS tooltip.

title: MicroTip — useMicroTip
code: useMicroTip()  microTip(   id = NULL,   tip = "Hey! tooltip!",   position = "top",   size = NULL,   session = getDefaultReactiveDomain() )

title: MicroTip — useMicroTip
text: id id element attach tooltip. tip Content tooltip. position tooltip appear relative target element. Defaults "top". Valid values : "top" "bottom" "left" "right" "top-left" "top-right" "bottom-left" "bottom-right" size Size tooltip. Defaults "fit" tooltip takeup size requires show text. Valid values : "fit" "small" "medium" "large" session Shiny session object.

title: MicroTip — useMicroTip
text: None

title: MicroTip — useMicroTip
text: useMicroTip: Dependencies include UI. microTip: Add tooltip.

title: MicroTip — useMicroTip
code: if (interactive()) { library(shiny) library(standby)  ui <- fluidPage(    useMicroTip(), # include dependencies   br(), br(), br(), br(),   actionButton(inputId = "btn",                label   = "MicroTip Demo")  )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    # display tooltip   microTip(id = "btn",            tip = "Hey there! This is a micro tip!",            position = "bottom-right")  }  shinyApp(ui, server) }

title: Notification Styles — useNS
text: Simple website notifications effects

title: Notification Styles — useNS
code: useNS()  notice(   message = "Hello",   type = "notice",   layout = "growl",   effect = "jelly",   session = getDefaultReactiveDomain() )

title: Notification Styles — useNS
text: message Notification message. type Notification type. Defaults "notice". valid values : "success" "warning" "error" layout Notification layout. Defaults "growl". valid values : "attached" "bar" effect Notification effect type. Valid values include: "growl" layout "scale" "jelly" "slide" "genie" "attached" layout "flip" "bouncyflip" "bar" layout "slidetop" "exploader" session Shiny session object.

title: Notification Styles — useNS
text: None

title: Notification Styles — useNS
text: useNS: Dependencies include UI. notice: Display notifications.

title: Notification Styles — useNS
code: if (interactive()) { library(shiny) library(standby)  ui <- fluidPage(    useNS(), # include dependencies   actionButton(inputId = "btn",                label   = "Notice Demo")  )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    observeEvent(input$btn, {     # display notification     notice("Hey there! Thank you for exploring standby!")   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server) }

title: PNotify — useNotify
text: Beautiful notifications prompts.

title: PNotify — useNotify
code: useNotify()  notify(   title = "Hey",   text = NULL,   type = "notice",   icon = TRUE,   delay = 8000,   hide = TRUE,   sticker = TRUE,   closer = TRUE,   shadow = TRUE,   mouse_reset = TRUE,   animation = "fade",   animate_speed = "normal",   width = "360px",   min_height = "16px",   max_text_height = "200px",   translucent = FALSE,   non_blocking = FALSE,   session = getDefaultReactiveDomain() )

title: PNotify — useNotify
text: title Title notice. can string, element FALSE (default) title. text Text notice. can string, element FALSE (default) text. type Type notice. Defaults "notice". valid values : "info" "success" "error" icon Logical; TRUE (default), default icon displayed. icon displayed set FALSE. delay Delay milliseconds notice removed. set "infinity", notice close. hide Logical; TRUE (default), notice closed |codedelay specified milliseconds. sticker Logical; TRUE (default), provides button user manually stick notice. closer Logical; TRUE (default), provides button user manually close notice. shadow Logical; TRUE (default), displays drop shadow. mouse_reset Logical; TRUE (default), resets hide timer mouse moves notice. animation animation used displaying hiding notice. "none" "fade" (default) supported box. animate_speed Speed notice animates . Valid values : "slow": 400ms "normal": 250ms "fast": 100ms width Width notice. Default "360px". min_height Minimum height notice. Default "16px". expand fit content. max_text_height Maximum height text container. Default "200px". text goes beyond height, scrollbars appear. Use NULL remove restriction. translucent Logical; TRUE, creates see notice. Defaults FALSE. non_blocking Logical; TRUE, notice fades show elements underneath. Defaults FALSE. session Shiny session object.

title: PNotify — useNotify
text: None

title: PNotify — useNotify
text: useNotify: Dependencies include UI. notify: Display notifications.

title: PNotify — useNotify
code: if (interactive()) { library(shiny) library(standby)  ui <- fluidPage(    useNotify(), # include dependencies   actionButton(inputId = "btn",                label   = "PNotify Demo")  )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    observeEvent(input$btn, {     # display notification     notify("Hey there!", "Thank you for exploring standby!")   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server) }

title: SpinKit — useSpinkit
text: Simple CSS spinners.

title: SpinKit — useSpinkit
code: useSpinkit()  spinkit(uiOutput, type = "plane", color = "#333", size = "40px")

title: SpinKit — useSpinkit
text: uiOutput output element wrapped within spinner. type Type spinner use. Valid values : plane chase bounce wave pulse flow swing circle circle_fade grid fold wander color Color spinner. Defaults "#333". Choose hexadecimal, RGB keyword values. size Size spinner. Defaults "40px".

title: SpinKit — useSpinkit
text: None

title: SpinKit — useSpinkit
text: useSpinkit: Dependencies include UI. spinkit: Display loading animation.

title: SpinKit — useSpinkit
code: if (interactive()) {   library(shiny)    shinyApp(     ui = fluidPage(       useSpinkit(),       actionButton("render", "Render"),       spinkit(plotOutput("plot"))     ),     server = function(input, output) {       output$plot <- renderPlot({         input$render         Sys.sleep(3)         hist(mtcars$mpg)       })     }   ) }

title: Tingle — useTingle
text: Minimalist easy use modals.

title: Tingle — useTingle
code: useTingle()  tingle(   content = "Hello",   close_button = FALSE,   button_label = "Close",   button_type = "default",   button_position = "right",   session = getDefaultReactiveDomain() )

title: Tingle — useTingle
text: content Content modal. close_button Logical; TRUE, displays button close modal. Defaults FALSE. button_label Label close_button. button_type Type button. Defaults "default". valid values : "primary" "danger" button_position Position button inside modal. Defaults "right". Valid values : "right" "left" session Shiny session object.

title: Tingle — useTingle
text: None

title: Tingle — useTingle
text: useTingle: Dependencies include UI. tingle: Display modals.

title: Tingle — useTingle
code: if (interactive()) { library(shiny) library(standby)  ui <- fluidPage(    useTingle(), # include dependencies   actionButton(inputId = "btn",                label   = "Tingle Demo")  )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    observeEvent(input$btn, {     # display modal     tingle("Hey there!, Thank you for exploring standby!")   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server) }

title: iziToast — useToast
text: Lightweight toast notifications

title: iziToast — useToast
code: useToast()  toast(   title = "Hey",   message = NULL,   type = NULL,   theme = NULL,   position = "center",   duration = 5000,   progress_bar_color = NULL,   background_color = NULL,   max_width = NULL,   title_color = NULL,   title_size = NULL,   title_line_height = NULL,   message_color = NULL,   message_size = NULL,   message_line_height = NULL,   image = NULL,   image_width = NULL,   zindex = 99999,   layout = 1,   balloon = FALSE,   close = TRUE,   close_on_escape = FALSE,   close_on_click = FALSE,   rtl = FALSE,   display_mode = 0,   drag_to_close = TRUE,   pause_on_hover = TRUE,   reset_on_hover = FALSE,   progress_bar_easing = "linear",   overlay = FALSE,   overlay_close = FALSE,   overlay_color = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)",   animate_inside = TRUE,   transition_in = "fadeInUp",   transition_out = "fadeOut",   session = getDefaultReactiveDomain() )

title: iziToast — useToast
text: title Title toast. message Message toast. type Type notification. Defaults NULL. Valid values : "info" "success" "warning" "error" theme Theme toast. Choose "light" "dark". position toast shown. Defaults "bottomRight". Valid values : "bottomRight" "bottomLeft" "topRight" "topLeft" "topCenter" "bottomCenter" "center" duration Time milliseconds close toast. Defaults 5000. Use FALSE disable. progress_bar_color Progress bar color. Choose hexadecimal, RGB keyword values. background_color Background color toast. Choose hexadecimal, RGB keyword values. max_width Maximum width toast. title_color Title color. Choose hexadecimal, RGB keyword values. title_size Title font size. title_line_height Title line height. message_color Message color. Choose hexadecimal, RGB keyword values. message_size Message font size. message_line_height Message line height. image Cover image. image_width Width cover image. Defaults "50px". zindex z-index CSS attribute toast. Defaults 99999. layout Size toast. Choose 1 2. balloon Logical; TRUE, applies balloon like toast. Defaults FALSE. close Logical; TRUE (default), shows x close button. close_on_escape Logical; TRUE, allows close toast using ESC key. Defaults FALSE. close_on_click Logical; TRUE, allows close toast clicking . Defaults FALSE. rtl Logical; TRUE, applies Right Left style. Defaults FALSE. display_mode Rules show multiple toasts. Default 0. Valid values : 0: Waits current toast closed displaying new one. 1: Replaces current toast new toast toast. drag_to_close Logical; TRUE (default), toast can closed dragging . pause_on_hover Logical; TRUE (default), pauses toast timeout cursor . reset_on_hover Logical; TRUE, resets toast timeout cursor . Defaults FALSE. progress_bar_easing Animation easing progress bar. Defaults "linear". overlay Logical; TRUE, displays overlay layer page. Defaults FALSE. overlay_close Logical; TRUE, allows close toast clicking overlay. Defaults FALSE. overlay_color Overlay background color. Defaults "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)". Choose hexadecimal, RGB keyword values. animate_inside Logical; TRUE (default), enables animation elements toast. transition_in Toast open animation. Defaults "fadeInUp". Valid values : "bounceInLeft" "bounceInRight" "bounceInUp" "bounceInDown" "fadeIn" "fadeInDown" "fadeInUp" "fadeInLeft" "fadeInRight" "flipInX" transition_out Toast close animation. Defaults "fadeOut". Valid values : "fadeOut" "fadeOutDown" "fadeOutUp" "fadeOutLeft" "fadeOutRight" "flipOutX" session Shiny session object.

title: iziToast — useToast
text: None

title: iziToast — useToast
text: useToast: Dependencies include UI. toast: Display toast notifications.

code: if (interactive()) { library(shiny) library(standby)  ui <- fluidPage(    useToast(), # include dependencies   actionButton(inputId = "btn",                label   = "iziToast Demo")  )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    observeEvent(input$btn, {     # display toast notification     toast("Hey there!", "Thank you for exploring standby!")   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server) }

title: Loading Visualization — useVizLoad

title: Loading Visualization — useVizLoad
text: uiOutput output element wrapped within spinner. type type bar/spinner use. Valid values : bars squares circles dots spinner dashed line bordered_line size size bar/spinner. Valid values : large medium small tiny fluid color color bar/spinner. Choose hexadecimal, RGB keyword values. add_label Logical; TRUE, displays label bar/spinner. Defaults FALSE. label label displayed bar/spinner. add_label must set TRUE display label.

title: Loading Visualization — useVizLoad
text: None
